title: Southern Italy Slow Luxury on the Ionian Coast with Daily Breakfast & Wine Tasting
description:
An intimate sanctuary nestled along Calabria's enchanting coastline, this Small Luxury Hotel of the World offers 32 uniquely designed boutique accommodations. Each one showcases exquisite artwork and furniture handcrafted by local artisans, while the property's Mediterranean architecture harmoniously integrates with its natural surroundings.

Highlights include the acclaimed Pietramare Natural Food restaurant, where guests can savour the forgotten flavours of Calabrian cuisine, and the picturesque Osteria del Mare, where fresh seafood shines in a relaxed poolside setting. Just steps away, a private beach with powdery white sand beckons, while the outdoor pool provides an idyllic alternative for relaxation.
